questions_1.question: The engine identification data plate is a metal plate that is riveted to
Options: The compressor rear frame yoke at 12 o’clock position
The compressor front frame yoke at 12 o’clock position
The compressor front frame yoke at 6 o’clock position
The compressor rear frame yoke at 6 o’clock position
